articles.description: Very few countries have cricket as their main sport. India, Pakistan, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka are four such nations and they need to be supported at every turn.
articles.content:
The big three of India, England and Australia have an inexorable responsibility to ensure the survival and prosperity of cricket in all other Test-playing nations.
It is noteworthy that in the midst… [+5057 chars]
